name: Hongdunzi No. 2 Coal Mine
company_mentions: Ningxia State-Owned Capital Operation Group Company

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%AE%81%E5%A4%8F%E7%BA%A2%E5%A2%A9%E5%AD%90%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8%E7%BA%A2%E4%BA%8C%E7%85%A4%E7%9F%BF. The Hongdunzi No. 2 Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Yinchuan area, with a construction scale of 2.4 million tons per year

owners: Ningxia State-Owned Capital Operation Group Company
web_search_companies.notes: Ningxia Hongdunzi Coal Industry Company operates the mine, which is fully owned by them. SPIC Aluminum & Power Investment Company and Ningxia State-Owned Capital Operation Group Company are parent companies.
